Package gobblin.yarn

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GobblinApplicationMaster
    The Yarn ApplicationMaster class for Gobblin.
    GobblinYarnAppLauncher
    A client driver to launch Gobblin as a Yarn application.
    GobblinYarnConfigurationKeys
    A central place for configuration related constants of Gobblin on Yarn.
    GobblinYarnEventConstants
    YARN specific event constants to be used with an EventSubmitter.
    GobblinYarnEventConstants.EventMetadata  
    GobblinYarnEventConstants.EventNames  
    GobblinYarnMetricTagNames
    A central place for constants of MetricContext tag names for Gobblin on Yarn.
    GobblinYarnTaskRunner  
    YarnAppSecurityManager
    A class for managing Kerberos login and token renewing on the client side that has access to the keytab file.
    YarnContainerSecurityManager
    A class for managing token renewing in the containers including the container for the GobblinApplicationMaster.
    YarnHelixUtils
    A utility class for Gobblin on Yarn.
    YarnService
    This class is responsible for all Yarn-related stuffs including ApplicationMaster registration, ApplicationMaster un-registration, Yarn container management, etc.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    HelixMessageSubTypes
    An enumeration of Helix message sub types.
